<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Live ranges pass through a number of stages as we try to allocate them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Some of the stages may also create new live ranges:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Region splitting.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Per-block splitting.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Local splitting.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Spilling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ranges produced by one of the stages skip the previous stages when they are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dequeued. This improves performance because we can skip interference checks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that are unlikely to give any results. It also guarantees that the live</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// range splitting algorithm terminates, something that is otherwise hard to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ensure.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4">LiveRangeStage</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ImmutableAnalysis abstraction for fetching the Eviction Advisor. We model it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// as an analysis to decouple the user from the implementation insofar as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// dependencies on other analyses goes. The motivation for it being an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// immutable pass is twofold:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - in the ML implementation case, the evaluator is stateless but (especially</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// in the development mode) expensive to set up. With an immutable pass, we set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// it up once.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - in the &#39;development&#39; mode ML case, we want to capture the training log</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// during allocation (this is a log of features encountered and decisions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// made), and then measure a score, potentially a few steps after allocation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// completes. So we need the properties of an immutable pass to keep the logger</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// state around until we can make that measurement.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Because we need to offer additional services in &#39;development&#39; mode, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// implementations of this analysis need to implement RTTI support.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisoranalysis"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisoranalysis/#a569f300915b37b41ea6be1f09ec7c0af">RegAllocEvictionAdvisorAnalysis</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/immutablepass/#a4d664099280bb09275254d64c329d25d">ImmutablePass</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisoranalysis/#a02472e81dfeca389aba455abdef60a09"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisoranalysis/#a02472e81dfeca389aba455abdef60a09">AdvisorMode</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisoranalysis/#a02472e81dfeca389aba455abdef60a09a7a1920d61156abc05a60135aefe8bc67">Default</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisoranalysis/#a02472e81dfeca389aba455abdef60a09ab8e7b465df7c5979dc731d06e84ce2cf">Release</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisoranalysis/#a02472e81dfeca389aba455abdef60a09a330f49df8243756a8a4dc7f7f7ee6dfe">Development</a> &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisoranalysis/#a569f300915b37b41ea6be1f09ec7c0af"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisoranalysis/#a569f300915b37b41ea6be1f09ec7c0af">RegAllocEvictionAdvisorAnalysis</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisoranalysis/#a02472e81dfeca389aba455abdef60a09">AdvisorMode</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/regallocevictionadvisor-cpp/#aef71c4b21823f236e70cc6d62375adcd">Mode</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">      : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/immutablepass/#a4d664099280bb09275254d64c329d25d">ImmutablePass</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocevictionadvisoranalysis/#aade7de0efd531765acebabd803cb4509">ID</a>), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/regallocevictionadvisor-cpp/#aef71c4b21823f236e70cc6d62375adcd">Mode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/regallocevictionadvisor-cpp/#aef71c4b21823f236e70cc6d62375adcd">Mode</a>)&#123;&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
